metadata.name: Clearing Windows Console History
metadata.comment: Identifies when a user attempts to clear console history. An adversary may clear the command history of a compromised account to conceal the actions undertaken during an intrusion.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('clear-history')) OR (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('remove-item')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('rm'))) AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('consolehost_history.txt')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('(get-psreadlineoption).historysavepath'))))

output.summary: Identifies when a user attempts to clear console history. An adversary may clear the command history of a compromised account to conceal the actions undertaken during an intrusion.
